caption.p: Humoral immunity of NHPs after EBOV challenge at 3 dpi. NHPs were given equine F(ab′) 2 starting at 3 dpi. The amounts of circulating serum antibodies against EBOV were measured by ELISA at the times indicated and expressed as arbitrary units (AU) per milliliter of serum. (A) IgM. (B) IgG.
